welcome_message_body: "Welcome to The Village, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and discover all of the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wiley Post Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal exclusively for private flights and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Will Rogers World Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tinker AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tinker AFB Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
